items.text: I think that learning languages is very important nowadays.
items.translation_uz: Men hozirgi kunda tillarni o'rganish juda muhim deb o'ylayman.

items.text: In my opinion, regular exercise helps to reduce stress.
items.translation_uz: Menimcha, muntazam jismoniy mashqlar stressni kamaytirishga yordam beradi.

items.text: I believe that everyone should have access to free education.
items.translation_uz: Men har kim bepul ta'limga ega bo'lishi kerak deb ishonarman.

items.text: As far as I am concerned, teamwork is essential for success.
items.translation_uz: Men uchun jamoa ishi muvaffaqiyat uchun zarur.

items.text: I strongly believe that protecting the environment is our duty.
items.translation_uz: Men atrof-muhitni himoya qilish bizning burchimiz deb qat'iy ishonaman.

items.text: From my point of view, reading books expands our knowledge.
items.translation_uz: Mening nuqtai nazarimdan, kitob o'qish bilimimizni kengaytiradi.

items.text: I feel that spending time with family is very valuable.
items.translation_uz: Men oila bilan vaqt o'tkazish juda qadrli deb hisoblayman.

items.text: It seems to me that technology is changing our lives rapidly.
items.translation_uz: Menga texnologiya hayotimizni tez o'zgartirmoqda deb tuyuladi.

items.text: I would say that healthy eating habits are fundamental.
items.translation_uz: Men sog'lom ovqatlanish odatlari asosiy deb aytardim.

items.text: Personally, I think that travel broadens the mind.
items.translation_uz: Shaxsan men sayohat fikrni kengaytiradi deb o'ylayman.

items.text: I am convinced that hard work always pays off eventually.
items.translation_uz: Men mehnatkashlik oxir-oqibat o'z samarasini beradi deb aminman.

items.text: The way I see it, communication skills are increasingly important.
items.translation_uz: Men ko'rganimdek, muloqot ko'nikmalari tobora muhim bo'lmoqda.
